meanings.sent1: The treader walked carefully along the path.
meanings.sent2: The hiker was a diligent treader of the mountain trails.
meanings.sent3: The little treader tiptoed around the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: She was a treader of new ground, always exploring different places.
meanings.sent5: The treader left footprints in the fresh snow, marking the way.

meanings.definition: A person who walks or steps on something.
meanings.sent1: The treader crossed the bridge with steady steps.
meanings.sent2: The farmer, a hardworking treader, tended to his crops.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy treader accidentally stepped on the rake and tripped.
meanings.sent4: She was a careful treader of the fragile ice, avoiding any cracks.
meanings.sent5: The treader left imprints in the wet sand as they walked along the shore.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for treading or stepping on something.
meanings.sent1: The treadmill is a popular treader for indoor exercise.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker used the treader to flatten the ground.
meanings.sent3: The robotic treader moved back and forth, compacting the soil.
meanings.sent4: The automated treader efficiently paved the road with precision.
meanings.sent5: The treader on the escalator carried people effortlessly to the next floor.
